works.description:
The article at the infringing URL is a word by word copy of my original article. The infringing page has shown an old date meant but it was published much later. Our original article was published on "20-Dec-2011". The infringing article shows the date "September 13, 2010", however, it talks about the product that was released in Sept 2011.

A line from the article:
"During the official release of Windows 8 developer preview edition, Microsoft showcased the Samsung Windows 8 tablet PC and also distributed some of them to the attendants"

The Windows 8 Developer Preview was release only in Sept 2011 and the distribution of Samsung Windows 8 Tablet PC happened around the same time. This itself is a proof that the infringing URL has shown an old date meant to cheat others.
